OK   
---------------------------

Comments.Message: I am having the same problem. I get an error when I try to close, and whether I hit close or continue, it will not exit.

The error description seems to indicate that the ItemCache.xml file is not writable. Assuming your C drive and Desktop is writable, try right-clicking on the data directory or the itemcache.xml file inside it and remove the read-only tick if enabled. Hopefully that will get rid of the issue.
This was a problem with the 2.2.5 zip, for the first hour or so it was up, and was fixed.
